workExperience.description: Sport analytics mobile app development for iOS and Android in Xamarin and React Native.

Working in XamlTeam4. Responsibilities: ChartView component for Silverlight and WPF, research and integration of new technologies. Introduced native DirectX drawing mode for ChartView component.
One of the founders of Cyclops Business Intelligence team. Responsibilities: Combining & analysing company data in private data warehouse. Creating reports in Tableau Desktop Professional.

  • RadBulletGraph for WPF/SL
  • RadChart for WPF/SL

Implementing new technologies to existing applications, applying design patterns and improving flexibility, compatibility and usability of existing WinForms applications and ASP.NET web services.
Developing windows and web applications using .NET 3.5 SP1, C# 3, ASP.NET, Silverlight, WCF, WPF for monitoring production systems over the Internet.
Testing company software products, doing test cases, test plans, test scenarios, helping development team with testing support, submitting bugs to company bug tracking system.
